short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract business information from Bing Maps search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎯 Description:
Maps Scraper & Leads Extractor is a powerful tool that helps businesses and professionals easily extract valuable business information from Bing Maps search results.

✨ Key Features:
• Extract business names, addresses, phone numbers, and websites
• Get precise GPS coordinates for each location
• Download data in CSV or Excel format
• Extract from current page or multiple pages
• Control the number of entries to extract
• Clean and organized data output
• User-friendly interface
• Fast and efficient extraction

📊 Perfect for:
• Lead Generation
• Market Research
• Competitor Analysis
• Business Development
• Sales Prospecting
• Local SEO Research
• Directory Building

🔍 Data Points Extracted:
• Business Names
• Complete Addresses
• Phone Numbers
• Websites
• GPS Coordinates
• Business Categories
• Social Media Links
• Featured Images

💡 Easy to Use:
1. Navigate to Bing Maps
2. Search for businesses
3. Click the extension
4. Choose extraction settings
5. Download in your preferred format

🔒 Privacy Focused:
• No data collection
• No login required
• No data transmitted to servers

💪 Professional Features:
• Bulk data extraction
• Pagination support
• Customizable extraction limits
• Multiple export formats
• Clean data organization
